channel.title: Blogs on Patrick Gatewood's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Patrick Gatewood's Blog

item.title: ðŸ‘‹ Hello, Hugo!
item.description: Welcome! You’ve found my first blog post. Hugo is an awesome open-source static site generator with a super active community. I’ve chosen Hugo as my blog framework so I can learn more about static site generators and post some write-ups of what I’m up to without needing to manually create my site or worry about a CMS. As with most blogs, I expect everything on this site to be content-driven, so Hugo is a great fit.
